Classes in gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency used by gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.OneD
IAxisAddible
          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the AxisOverlay2D for displaying axis calibrations.
ILegendAddible
          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the LegendOverlay.
IOverlayAddible
          This interface provides the most basic functions required by all overlays.
ITruLogAxisAddible
          This interface is implemented by components that utilize the the AxisOverlay with true logarithmic calibrations, that which do not contain values less than or equal to zero.
IZoomAddible
          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize overlays which respond to zooming.
IZoomTextAddible
          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize overlays which respond to zooming and display text.
 

Classes in gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency used by gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency

          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the AxisOverlay2D for displaying axis calibrations.
ILegendAddible
          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the LegendOverlay.
IOverlay
          This interface lays out methods to be implemented by all view component overlays.

          This interface provides the most basic functions required by all overlays.
IZoomAddible
          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize overlays which respond to zooming.
IZoomTextAddible
          This interface is implemented by view components that utilize overlays which respond to zooming and display text.
Marker
          This class is a datastructure for grouping together all of the information necessary for making a marker.
OverlayJPanel

          This interface provides the most basic functions required by all overlays.
